# == DO NOT EDIT THE FOLLOWING LINES for the Raspberry Pi Pico VS Code Extension to work ==
if(WIN32)
    set(USERHOME $ENV{USERPROFILE})
else()
    set(USERHOME $ENV{HOME})
endif()
set(sdkVersion 2.2.0)
set(toolchainVersion 14_2_Rel1)
set(picotoolVersion 2.2.0-a4)
set(picoVscode ${USERHOME}/.pico-sdk/cmake/pico-vscode.cmake)
if (EXISTS ${picoVscode})
    include(${picoVscode})
endif()
# ====================================================================================
set(PICO_BOARD pico2 CACHE STRING "Board type")

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13)

include(pico_sdk_import.cmake)

project(test_project C CXX ASM)

set(CMAKE_C_STANDARD 11)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
pico_sdk_init()

add_executable(badumtss
  main.c
  midi.c
  adc.c
  usb_descriptors.c
)

pico_enable_stdio_usb(badumtss 0)
pico_enable_stdio_uart(badumtss 1)

target_include_directories(badumtss PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR})
pico_generate_pio_header(badumtss ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/resistor_dac.pio)

pico_add_extra_outputs(badumtss)
target_link_libraries(badumtss PRIVATE pico_stdlib tinyusb_device tinyusb_board hardware_adc hardware_dma)
